website_summaries.verdict: Affordable pool filter if you are looking for something that fits into your tight budget.
pros: Has optimal flow to generate clean water quality in your pool
cons: Can malfunction every now and then

customer_reviews.title: Works Perfect Great Buy at a Hundred Bucks.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a replacement for my INTEX cartridge style filter. It works very well for my pool (18 foot round x 48" deep). It came with the required barb fittings to connect it to my existing supply/return hoses. This unit will run the INTEX vacuum much better than the original pump, and the INTEX skimmer works great now. I did a little extra plumbing work installed a Tee and a valve so I can switch between the skimmer and side intakes without fooling around with all the hoses. I will post a picture soon.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Goebel

customer_reviews.title: Sand filter is working great however pump fizzled out in less than two months.
customer_reviews.text: Changed from paper cartridge filter to the sand filter. Wow what a huge improvement! I had trouble keeping pool clear with existing skimmer pump and filter but after changing to the sand filter pool went from cloudy to crystal clear overnight! I only have to run pump at night now it keeps pool Crystal clear! Only drawback is I wish it had a built in timer. Went to Home Depot and purchased a programmable electric timer so pump will automatically run at time at Set it for.
customer_reviews.author: M.D.

customer_reviews.title: Time versus Money
customer_reviews.text: So like everyone on here, I have a walmart 4000 gallon pool. The skimmer filter that came with the pool just moved the water around, didnt really keep pool clean. I was spending an hour each morning before work just getting the pool clean. I purchased this filter, and only have to maintain this filter once per week. I can go make more money, I just cant make more time, so this is a very smart investment if you want to get 5 hours of your life back per week.... Just push the button and buy it.
customer_reviews.author: matt colley

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly disappointed
customer_reviews.text: After reading all the reviews and researching various sand filter pumps we bought this one. The instructions are horrible. Hooking it up to the pool - what a joke. When it arrived the box the pump was in was damaged but the Amazon shipping box was fine. After inspecting the pump everything look in good condition so we continued with installation. We have had this pump for a month and it hasn't worked. There is no pressure whatsoever. We haven't been able to use our pool for over a month because of all the problems this filter has caused. Don't bother
customer_reviews.author: grlnXtdoor

customer_reviews.title: Contact me
customer_reviews.text: I have had a problem with this the first weeknofnit running. I have called the company number. And I have emailed 2 different emailed and still cant get a hold of any one... it stopped working right away. I have to take it apart every time it stops working and I have to spin the wheel around to get it to start moving the water through the pump into the sand filter.. I really wish someone would contact me. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Works fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Oh my, the answer to Soft sided Pools that come with small cartridge filters. Turned my pool crystal clear overnight. No other parts needed if you are using a port in and out. If you have a Skimmer type pool, I suggest getting the solid cover for the bottom, but we did work around that problem when we hooked up our incoming line.
customer_reviews.author: suziecpo

customer_reviews.title: Motor stopped working within first week
customer_reviews.text: Filter seemed good, actually the filter is fine. The pump on the other hand, has stopped working within one week. I built a box around my pump to protect it from the elements. Currently if I turn it on it just hums but does not pump water, seems like the starter is broken. Replacing the pump is going to cost about as much as the pump/filter combo I just bought.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not in love with it
customer_reviews.text: Does what it's supposed to do. Instructions arent great and wish it had a leaf catcher attached to the pump. Also, the first week, the setup worked great with plenty of pressure but after that, it's as good as the cheap pumps that come with the above ground pools. Gauge doesn't work and has water in it and there isn't a power button switch.
customer_reviews.author: Joel G.

customer_reviews.title: Time & Money saver
customer_reviews.text: Works great, after we figured out how to install it ( instructions are vague) we replaced a filter pump with this sand filter. Hoping to save money on 5$ filters 3x week! 16’ ft above ground pool. Keeping it nice and clean and easy to back wash and rinse! No timer or on/off switch😒
customer_reviews.author: Jona

customer_reviews.title: Pump failed
customer_reviews.text: The pump didn't even 'pump' water. Not sure what was up. It had power, same outlet I used for the previous pump I had owned. It 'ran' but just had no pressure, even when I just ran water lines from the input and output while bypassing the sand filter tank itself. I rolled the dice on this since some people had luck with it. I got a dud. Got a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Austin Rhymer

customer_reviews.title: Motor not strong enough to push water through sand
customer_reviews.text: It's not powerful enough to push the water through the sand. My husband had to put a second motor on the pool to circulate the water through. We have the 9 x 18 4ft rectangular intex pool so probably better for the smaller round one.
customer_reviews.author: christy

customer_reviews.title: Get the right adapters for your preference, for whichever hoses you choose to use.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome pump! Way way better than the original that came with our colmen pool. It was an easy set up, everything works perfectly and makes the pool sparkle! Only down side is we had to put a hair dryer to the hoses that came with the pump to stretch them out to fit, but once they did we had no other trouble. Just make sure u buy the adapters for the hoses to fit the pool holes. We got ours at Leslie's.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly Williams

customer_reviews.title: Cheap pump not worth it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: So a couple things about this pump. One is it is very cheaply made. Leaked everywhere after even using RTV to seal them. The gauge also leaked but didn't even assemble right. This part of the pump was my fault for not researching but the motor was to weak for my 18x48 pool. Not easy to install on a Bestway pool.
customer_reviews.author: mark p jordan

customer_reviews.title: Works good for about two weeks.
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for the two weeks it work properly. The pump suddenly stopped pumping water, the motor still runs just has no pressure even when I disconnected the hose to the filter. I have tried three times to call and sent two emails and have yet toreceived a return call or email from the company.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy & Angela

customer_reviews.title: This pump is definitely a must have for all pools!
customer_reviews.text: This pump was a lifesaver for our 20x20 pool set up was simple the timer function is perfect and our pool water looked crystal clear!
customer_reviews.author: Tasha

customer_reviews.title: Worked good for me
customer_reviews.text: I even put this together because my husband works away from home. It worked great and cant wait to use it this year.
customer_reviews.author: barbara mcdaniel

customer_reviews.title: Runs great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pump for the 1/2hp. I had a 1/4hp. It is a good product for what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: david fyvie

customer_reviews.title: Don't purchase...GARBAGE
customer_reviews.text: This poll pump is not good at all. The suction is almost null and it would not even circulate the water. I not only wasted my money buying it but also purchased an extended warranty on something that doesn't work from the get go. The whole unit was plastic also and didn't come apart like my old one. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Chapman

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I’m surprised how well it works! Didn’t think it would be as good as it is based on its low price. Much more powerful than I thought it would be. Using it in a 9 x 5 foot pool as a temporary holding tank for salt water fish. Only issue is poor instruction manual. Once figured out works as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Reinhardt

customer_reviews.title: Awful directions
customer_reviews.text: Pump works as it should but installation instructions are terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Angie P.

customer_reviews.title: using as a sand filter for a 120 gallon aquarium works awesome.
customer_reviews.text: I used my pump. the cost of a sand filter is so expensive for what it is and this is way better, first the flow controls are way above those found in aquarium setups, along with the cleanout feature makes water changing a breeze . the size is just perfect. you can fit the unit in the filter cabinet it's a must for larger aquariums.
customer_reviews.author: LBJOHN

customer_reviews.title: Did not last long.
customer_reviews.text: This pump worked miracles for our larger pool and kept it clean. Just disappointed that the engine burned out in one year. For the cost I would’ve liked to have seen it have a longer life.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Rakowicz

customer_reviews.title: Cheap junk
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy. Used for maybe two weeks last summer. Go to start it up this year, and the housing is busted. If I could select zero stars I would have.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: dose not work well
customer_reviews.text: Does not have enough power, clogs easily and dose NOT keep the pool clean. very disappointed. Wish I would return it but now I'm stuck with it and out 150$.
customer_reviews.author: Steve ODell

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: Pump has hardly any water pressure after running through the filter..tried different kind of sand and still not worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: I would strongly recommend any product from this company
customer_reviews.text: I would strongly recommend any product from this company. My filter works very good, my pump went out after about 6 months, but they shipped me another one very quickly no questions asked.
customer_reviews.author: dakota

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Everthing worked as it should and water is very clear!
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: great little filter
customer_reviews.text: Very quiet which is nice, it works great for my 15 ft round above ground pool, vacuum in is easy, and the set up was easy the directions were good, simple if it's not a first time filter set up for you.
customer_reviews.author: Marc L.

customer_reviews.title: could be better
customer_reviews.text: The unit looks pretty solid. I am a little disappointed when we are vacuuming the pool, fines appear to go right thru the filter.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Shafer

customer_reviews.title: Directions suck
customer_reviews.text: Need a better assembly directions. Like a step by step video. Still can't. Get it together properly. Help. Worst directions ever
customer_reviews.author: Fr

customer_reviews.title: 12in blue wave sand filter
customer_reviews.text: We bought this pump in 2016. We love it. We just now have to replace the hoses.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Cluck

product_meta.title: Blue Wave 12-Inch Sand Filter System with 1/2 HP Pump for Above Ground Pools
product_meta.description: If you need to replace your original Intex pump and filter, this is your system. Sandman's excellent construction and reliability will keep your pool cleaner and the system is easy to operate. Sandman's rugged filter tank is constructed of durable polyethylene that withstands winter's worst and is corrosion proof. The top mount multi port makes using the system and backwashing quick and easy. Since there is no cartridge to clean, this system is very low maintenance. In addition to a rugged filter tank, Sandman is powered by a 1/2 HP dynamo. You will be impressed by the flow rate in your pool and its quiet efficient operation. Replace that leaky, low flow rate Intex system with Sandman's sand filter system and enjoy cleaner water and trouble free operation. System Includes: Base, Pump, Filter tank, 4-position multi port valve, Clamps, fittings and pressure gauge.
feature_bullets: Engineered to provide optimum flow rate; 6-ft cord, UL listed
Easy assembly and excellent performance and reliability
Not legal for sale in California
